name: Gaslight: 1850
description:
This is going to be an interactive mechanical demo for a larger game I've been working on for a few years now in my free time.

You can download and play these builds as I complete work and get a sense for what I'm working towards.

This is going to be a small demo game with a larger one to come. Feel free to hang out, pitch ideas, or just play the builds as I release them.

Please join the discord! https://discord.gg/3U8XffX

I'm streaming the development of Gaslight: 1850

here: https://www.twitch.tv/returntocinder and here: https://www.youtube.com/user/ReturnToCinder
